name: Pixel
description: Pixel is an oscilloscope-themed robot known for its impeccable style and unwavering loyalty. With its classic box-shaped body and soldier-like demeanor, Pixel is a formidable companion in the world of WebtrES club. Its vibrant screen displays a cute cat, adding a touch of charm to its overall appearance. To complete its look, Pixel is equipped with sleek shades that give it a cool and mysterious vibe.
